messages.title: Winning Here!
messages.content: Only Colin Eldridge or Labour's candidate from London can win here.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Tory & Green parties are out of the race. Liverpool elections are between Liberal Democrats and Labour. Conservatives haven't been able to win here since the 1970's. Local Green Party leader Peter Cranie even suggested his party 'should avoid Lib Dem/Labour marginals, such as the constituency I live in, Liverpool Wavertree.' Ladbrokes odds: Conservative 100-1, Green 100-1.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, FREEPOST RLXH-TAJH-ZZCG, 509 Smithdown Road, L15 5AE

images.caption: Graph showing voting percentages with LIB DEM 41% and LAB 49%, and a photo of Colin Eldridge.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet encourages tactical voting and provides a photo finish prediction between local Lib Dem Colin Eldridge and Labour's London Candidate, suggesting that the voters' help could make the difference. Instructions on how to help are provided, including displaying a poster, delivering leaflets, volunteering, making a donation, or calling a phone number (which is not disclosed).
